short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle text editing on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a great tool for copywriters and copywriting professors because it allows you to edit any text on any website with just one click.

You click on the extension once and then you click on the text you want to edit. It will automagically become an editable field.

Enjoy!
